59b24f18-ef4e-463b-821b-925792af1fe4.name: Loner
59b24f18-ef4e-463b-821b-925792af1fe4.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever anyone lingers nearby, watches over your shoulder, etc. If you fail, you lash out at that person just as if you had Bad Temper.

447a54be-3a4f-4502-a18e-6c9cfddc3a8f.name: Selfish
447a54be-3a4f-4502-a18e-6c9cfddc3a8f.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you experience a clear social slight or “snub.” On a failure, you lash out at the offending party just as if you had Bad Temper.

features.situation: from others when your Selfishness surfaces
